    Technology and Human Research in Engineering Design

    Meet our team

    The THRED Group is comprised of an interdisciplinary group of kickass researchers that are exploring people, products, and processes and the interactions between each of them.

    People

    Human beings are fascinating. We are particularly fascinated by humans engaged in design and problem-solving.

    Product

    We design better and more intelligent products and systems.

    Process

    We care about and seek to improve the methods that engineers and designers use.
